RecordAlertActionableTarget.name: RecordAlertActionableTarget
RecordAlertActionableTarget.description: Represents the action associated with the parent record alert.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isn't null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the record alert actionable target.

RecordAlertId.description: The parent record alert associated with the record alert actionable target.

TargetObjectName.description: The name of the target object that's used to create a record on the parent record alert. Applicable when users specify create in the type field.

TargetRecordIdentifier.description: The ID of the target record that a user is navigated to. Applicable when users specify view in the type field.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the record alert actionable target, such as create or view.
